alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 9:53AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. .Most of the heavy May rainfall has made its way into the Minnesota River and gradual receding is expected at Henderson and all points upstream. Some rises still ongoing between Henderson and the confluence with the Mississippi. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Fleischer Rd flooded in North Redwood; storm sewers closed off and bypass pumping begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 AM CDT Saturday, the stage was 24.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 AM CDT Saturday was 24.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 22.3 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.9 feet on 08/20/2017. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
